mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_bt_feed_product_image ( `channel_id`, `code`, `image_type_id`, `image_url`, `image_name`, `sent_flag`, `created`, `creater`, `modified`, `modifier` ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{code}, #{imageTypeId}, #{imageUrl}, #{imageName}, #{sentFlag}, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{creater} )
